20110125150834.000|20110125150836.000|TR0|$100 billion.
20110125150836.000|20110125150839.000|TR0|
20110125150839.000|20110125150841.000|TR0|In Lubbock, Texas, a 15-year-old girl 
20110125150841.000|20110125150844.000|TR0|leaves for a baby sitting job and then 
20110125150844.000|20110125150846.000|TR0|never comes home.  That was two weeks ago. 
20110125150846.000|20110125150849.000|TR0| Now, police have discovered a young  
20110125150849.000|20110125150851.000|TR0|girl's body and the community is waiting 
20110125150851.000|20110125150854.000|TR0|to see if it's her.  This is Elizabeth 
20110125150854.000|20110125150856.000|TR0|Ennen, who police say was abducted while 
20110125150856.000|20110125150859.000|TR0|babysitting at a motel on January 4.  
20110125150859.000|20110125150901.000|TR0|Umberto Maldonado Salinas is charged with 
20110125150901.000|20110125150904.000|TR0|the kidnapping.  Ennen was baby sitting 
20110125150904.000|20110125150906.000|TR0|with his children.  Police say they have 
20110125150906.000|20110125150909.000|TR0|evidence linking him to her disappearance 
20110125150909.000|20110125150911.000|TR0|but they won't say what it is.
20110125150911.000|20110125150914.000|TR0|
20110125150914.000|20110125150916.000|TR0|Her parents reported her missing to police 
20110125150916.000|20110125150919.000|TR0|when she never came home that night but

20110125152204.000|20110125152206.000|TR0|powerful storm, certainly impacting your

20110125154406.000|20110125154409.000|TR0|BARACK OBAMA, PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED 
20110125154409.000|20110125154411.000|TR0|STATES:  Our approach would preserve the 
20110125154411.000|20110125154414.000|TR0|right of Americans who have insurance to

20110125154421.000|20110125154424.000|TR0|according to the Congressional Budget

20110125154426.000|20110125154429.000|TR0|both parties have cited as the official 
20110125154429.000|20110125154431.000|TR0|score keeper for Congress, our approach 
20110125154431.000|20110125154434.000|TR0|would bring down the deficit by over $1 
20110125154434.000|20110125154436.000|TR0|trillion over the next two decades.
20110125154436.000|20110125154439.000|TR0|
20110125154439.000|20110125154441.000|TR0|(END VIDEO CLIP)
20110125154441.000|20110125154444.000|TR0|
20110125154444.000|20110125154446.000|TR0|FOREMAN:  Two months after that speech, he 
20110125154446.000|20110125154449.000|TR0|signed the most sweeping overhaul of 
20110125154449.000|20110125154451.000|TR0|health care law since the 1960s.  Once it

20110125155549.000|20110125155551.000|TR0|Alexandria, in cities in upper Egypt.

20110125155619.000|20110125155621.000|TR0|well aware of this more than a week ago.

20110125155626.000|20110125155629.000|TR0|(INAUDIBLE) youth. And another group that
